A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi made the Prequels seem like Citizen Kane. I’m a huge Star Wars fan\, and it’s clear that Disney simply doesn’t understand what its fans want. There were too many characters that had significant screen time for pointless reasons. Daisy Ridley was the lone bright spot. If there is a bright center to the Star Wars universe\, this is the movie that it’s farthest from.
